final_poem:
Rainy Days

Droplets fall like tears from above
A soothing melody, a gentle love
The sky weeps for the world's design
Washing away the dirt and grime within

In puddles reflected skies are gray
As raindrops dance upon my face today
Fragrant scents of wet earth rise high
Invigorating senses, calming sighs

Rainy days like these I adore
A symphony of water on my floor
The rhythm echoes in my soul's deep core
Calming fears and washing away each bore.
